remarks: Composing finitely supported functions with a bijection yields a bijection between sets of finitely supported functions.  See also ~ mapfienOLD .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 25-Aug-2017.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 1-Sep-2019.)
statement:
fcobij.1 $e |- ( ph -> G : S -1-1-onto-> T ) $.
fcobij.2 $e |- ( ph -> R e. U ) $.
fcobij.3 $e |- ( ph -> S e. V ) $.
fcobij.4 $e |- ( ph -> T e. W ) $.
fcobijfs.5 $e |- ( ph -> O e. S ) $.
fcobijfs.6 $e |- Q = ( G ` O ) $.
fcobijfs.7 $e |- X = { g e. ( S ^m R ) | g finSupp O } $.
fcobijfs.8 $e |- Y = { h e. ( T ^m R ) | h finSupp Q } $.
fcobijfs $p |- ( ph -> ( f e. X |-> ( G o. f ) ) : X -1-1-onto-> Y ) $.
$d G f h $.
$d O f h $.
$d O g h $.
$d Q f h $.
$d R f h $.
$d R g h $.
$d S f h $.
$d S g h $.
$d T f h $.
$d X f $.
$d Y f $.
$d f h ph $.
